resources.string:
How to use the Event Planner


Navigation:
 • Use the bottom navigation bar to switch between different sections of the app.


Dashboard:
 • Use the 'Upcoming' and 'Past' tabs to switch between viewing upcoming and past events.


Events:
 • To add a new event, tap the + button on the events screen.
 • Pressing the microphone button allows you to create a new event based on your voice input. (… called [title] on [date] at [time])
 • Fill in the event details including title, description, date, time, category, etc.
 • Events will show notifications as reminders when they're approaching.


Calendar:
 • Click on dates to display the events that are happening on that day.


Settings:
 • Toggle Dark Mode from the menu in the top-right corner.
